snippet.title: The Crimson Maid -  Announcement - Play the DEMO now!
snippet.description:
🌹 Introducing our latest adventure game: "The Crimson Maid" 🌹

Play as Marius as he returns to his childhood home in an attempt to reconnect with his ailing father, stern mother and overwhelmed younger brother. Much to your surprise, your household now employs an alluring young maid, Irina, who charms you from the first sight. But your blossoming romance will soon be tested as a dreadful murder shakes the feeble balance of this noble family.

❤️ And that's not all! The official announcement brings exciting news!

🎮 Play the DEMO now on Steam:
👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2695260/The_Crimson_Maid 👈

The Crimson Maid is an adventure game focused on dialogues, exploration and light puzzle solving. Speak to Irina and your family to discover how they feel, their deep desires and what they may be hiding. Rummage around the mansion and the surrounding estate for clues, optional puzzles, misplaced documents and insights into the family and its past. Embark on a journey of self discovery as Marius comes to terms with his choices, their consequences and the unexpected legacy of his lineage.

Official page: https://grimtalin.com/crimsonmaid
Press kit: https://grimtalin.com/crimsonmaid_presskit
More games: https://grimtalin.com
